EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Perfecting the Software Life Cycle_Q216.Post-event email 6-30-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending: Perfecting the Software Life Cycle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/perfecting-the-software-life-cycle]]> Thank you for the interest in the webinar, Perfecting the Software Life Cycle. If you would like to learn more about related topics, please consider attending SpringOne Platform Conference <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]> in Las Vegas from August 1 to 4, 2016.
Content will include technical sessions, customer presentations, and general awesomeness on a variety of topics including continuous integration and delivery, reactive programming, and building microservices.
Spend time with technologists and developers from some of the world's most innovative and well-known companies like NetFlix, PayPal, The Hone Depot, NBC Universal, and Google. Check out the session catalog here <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/sessions]]>.
The Pivotal Team
